definition: variant of 少安毋躁[shao3 an1 wu2 zao4]
see 稍息[shao4 xi1]
somewhat/a little
surname An
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
(literary) no/don't/to not have/nobody
surname Wu
hot-tempered/impatient

sentences.english: Because God is thinking of something better to give you.
sentences.chinese: 请稍安毋躁，因为上主总是预留了最好的给你。
稍安毋躁，我们还有时间。

too polite/overcourteous

to wait a moment/later/in awhile
to wait a moment
to report (to one's superior)

undue trouble/Thank you for having gone out of your way to help me.
